Paragraph: Similarly , all adenosine receptor agonists decreased amphetamine - induced hyperactivity , but at the higher doses than those which were active in cocaine - induced hyperactivity .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Amphetamine-induced hyperactivity |
| Cocaine-induced hyperactivity |

These two entities are recognized as diseases or conditions because they refer to abnormal or excessive behaviors or activities that are associated with the use of amphetamines and cocaine, respectively. These conditions can have negative effects on an individual's health and well-being.
